name: Lemon Drop Martini
about: Here are the secrets to a refreshing and tangy lemon drop martini! Learn how to make this classic cocktail at home, from rim-dipping techniques to the ideal vodka-to-lemon ratio.
steps_to_prepare: Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Pour gin and vermouth into the glass.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with an olive or lemon twist.

name: Cranberry Martini
about: This cranberry martini is a fun and refreshing spin on the vodka martini starring cranberry juice, Cointreau and lemon!
steps_to_prepare: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Pour the vodka, cranberry juice, triple sec, and lime juice into the shaker.
Shake well until the mixture is chilled.
Strain the mixture into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge or cranberries, if desired.
